metadata.title: CVE-2017-8761 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In OpenStack Swift through 2.10.1, 2.11.0 through 2.13.0, and 2.14.0, the proxy-server logs full tempurl paths, potentially leaking reusable tempurl signatures to anyone with read access to these logs. All Swift deployments using the tempurl middleware are affected.

criterions.comment: swift package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
